blockquote: Working with Reggie and Solid Builders felt like having a full creative department in our pocket. Fast, smart, and somehow always five steps ahead.

Solid Builders did an excellent job on our master suite addition. I would highly recommend them to anyone seeking any remodeling on their home. We were so impressed with the details Aaron and his team put into both the bedroom and bathroom...
Bold ideas, zero drama. Just great work.
Working with Solid Builders felt like having a full creative department in our pocket. Fast, smart, and somehow always five steps ahead.
